account_id.title: Account ID
account_id.description: The Facebook Ad Account ID. Required for all requests in pair with Personal Access Token.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: Access Token for making authenticated requests.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. All data generated between Start Date and this date will be replicated. Any data after this date will not be replicated. Not setting this option will result in always syncing the latest data.

include_deleted.title: Include Deleted
include_deleted.description: Include data from deleted campaigns, ads and adsets.

insights_lookback_window.title: Insights Lookback Window
insights_lookback_window.description: The attribution window for actions. That is, the maximum number of days allowed between when a user views or clicks an ad, and takes an action, to attribute their action to the ad.

insights_days_per_job.title: Insights Days Per Job
insights_days_per_job.description: The number of days to sync in one job. The more data you have - the smaller you want this parameter to be.

custom_insights.title: Custom Insights
custom_insights.description: A list which contains insights entries, each entry must have the Name and can contains Fields, Breakdowns or Action Breakdowns.

action_breakdowns.title: Action Breakdowns
action_breakdowns.description: A list of chosen Action Breakdowns.

action_breakdowns.title: Action Breakdowns
action_breakdowns.description: The list of chosen Action Breakdowns.
